Class Wombat

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Wombat
  • public class Wombat
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Wombat. A Wombat moves forward until it hits the edge of the world, at which point it turns left. If a wombat finds a leaf, it eats it.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Michael KÃ¶lling
